patterns: What are the food options on North Campus?
I'm hungry, where should I go?
responses: There are several places to eat at the Commons: Moe’s Southwest Grill, Subway, Panda Express, Tim Hortons, Burger King, and Starbucks.
For a sit-down meal, you could visit Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) in the Ellicott Complex.
If you're near Capen, Capen Café offers Starbucks and grab-and-go options.
Alumni Arena has Jamba Juice and Freshens Fresh Food Studio with salads and rice bowls.
Davis Hall Café is great for coffee and pastries if you're nearby.
For quick snacks and meals, the Union Market offers sandwiches, salads, pizza, and sushi.

patterns: Where can I get vegan food?
responses: Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) offers vegan meals with dedicated stations.
Freshens at Alumni Arena has vegan grain bowls and salads.
The Union Market also offers vegan grab-and-go options, including salads and fresh fruits.
For a quick vegan meal, try Moe’s Southwest Grill in the Commons where you can customize your order.

patterns: Where can I get vegetarian food?
responses: Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) has vegetarian stations with a wide range of options.
Subway in the Commons allows you to customize your sandwich with vegetarian ingredients.
Freshens at Alumni Arena also provides vegetarian salads and bowls.
The Union Market offers vegetarian sushi and other grab-and-go items.

patterns: Where can I get gluten-free food?
responses: Freshens at Alumni Arena offers gluten-free grain bowls and salads.
Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) has gluten-free stations available for a full meal.
You can also find gluten-free snacks and grab-and-go options at the Union Market.

patterns: Where can I eat with a nut allergy?
responses: Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) has nut-free stations available, just ask the staff for assistance.
Moe’s Southwest Grill in the Commons allows you to customize your meal to be nut-free.
Check with staff at the Union Market to confirm which grab-and-go items are safe for nut allergies.
Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) offers a variety of lactose-free meals.
Freshens at Alumni Arena has lactose-free options, including smoothies made with plant-based milks.
Subway and Moe’s Southwest Grill in the Commons also have lactose-free customization options.

patterns: I don't want to spend much
Where can I eat for cheap on North Campus?
responses: For affordable meals, Subway in the Commons offers budget-friendly sandwiches.
Burger King is another affordable option for a quick bite.
You can grab a snack or sandwich at the Union Market for a low-cost meal.
Tim Hortons has inexpensive coffee, donuts, and sandwiches if you're in the Commons.

patterns: What's the wait time at Moe's?
How busy is Moe's right now?
Is there a line at Moe's?
How long is the wait at Moe's Southwest Grill?
responses: The wait time at Moe’s is typically around 10-15 minutes during lunch hours.
Moe's usually has a moderate wait time of 10 minutes, depending on the time of day.

patterns: What's the wait time at Tim Hortons?
How busy is Tim Hortons right now?
Is there a line at Tim Hortons?
How long is the wait at Tim Hortons?
responses: Tim Hortons can have a short wait during peak times, usually no more than 10 minutes.
The wait at Tim Hortons is typically quick, about 5-10 minutes.

patterns: What's the wait time at Subway?
How busy is Subway right now?
Is there a line at Subway?
How long is the wait at Subway in the Commons?
responses: Subway is quick, with wait times under 5 minutes on average.
Subway usually has a very short wait, around 5 minutes.

patterns: What's the wait time at C3?
How busy is C3 right now?
Is there a line at Crossroads Culinary Center?
How long is the wait at C3?
responses: Crossroads Culinary Center (C3) can be busy during dinner, but lines move quickly.
The wait time at C3 varies, but it's usually around 10 minutes during peak hours.

patterns: What's the wait time at Freshens?
How busy is Freshens right now?
Is there a line at Freshens?
How long is the wait at Freshens in Alumni Arena?
responses: Freshens at Alumni Arena has a moderate wait time of around 5-10 minutes.
The wait time at Freshens is typically about 5 minutes.

patterns: What's the wait time at Jamba Juice?
How busy is Jamba Juice right now?
Is there a line at Jamba Juice?
How long is the wait at Jamba Juice in Alumni Arena?
responses: Jamba Juice usually has a short wait time, around 5 minutes.
You can expect a quick wait at Jamba Juice, typically no more than 5 minutes.

patterns: Where can I get Mexican food?
Is there Mexican food on campus?
responses: For Mexican food, head to Moe’s Southwest Grill in the Commons.
Moe’s Southwest Grill offers customizable burritos, tacos, and more with a Mexican flair.

patterns: Where can I get a burger?
Where can I find burgers on campus?
responses: If you're craving a burger, Burger King in the Commons has you covered.
Head to Burger King in the Commons for a variety of burgers and fast food.

patterns: Where's the best place for coffee on campus?
responses: For coffee, you can visit Starbucks at Capen Café or the Commons, or Tim Hortons in the Commons.
Starbucks and Tim Hortons in the Commons are popular spots for coffee on campus.

patterns: Where's the best place for sushi?
Where can I find sushi on campus?
responses: If you're in the mood for sushi, try the Union Market or grab it fresh from the sushi section.
You can find sushi at the Union Market, freshly made and ready to go.

patterns: Where can I get sweets on campus?
Where can I get sweets on campus?
responses: For something sweet, Tim Hortons and Starbucks offer pastries, while Jamba Juice at Alumni Arena has fruit smoothies.
You can satisfy your sweet tooth at Tim Hortons or Starbucks in the Commons with a variety of pastries.

patterns: I'm in the mood for Asian food
Where can I get Asian food?
Where's the best place for Asian food on campus?
responses: For Asian cuisine, Panda Express in the Commons has a variety of quick Chinese food options.
Panda Express in the Commons offers a range of Asian-inspired dishes, perfect for a quick meal.
